title: Bitcoin Spot ETF Will Open Door to New Investors: Volatility Shares Co-Founder
description: "Why on Earth wouldn't they allow spot Bitcoin through," said Volatility Shares co-founder Justin Young.

title: Biggest Movers: SOL Surges to 2-Month High on Saturday, Extending Recent Bull Run
description: Solana extended recent gains on Saturday, as the token rose for a third straight session to start the weekend. Today’s move came following a breakout of a key price level, despite the global crypto market cap consolidating. Avalanche also rallied, climbing by as much as 10%. Solana (SOL) Solana (SOL) was a notable gainer in […]

title: Tether freezes USDT addresses linked to the $130 million Multichain exploit
description: Tether Holdings, the issuer of the USDT stablecoin, has frozen two addresses on the Ethereum network that received funds from Multichain's multi-party computation (MPC) address

title: Report: institutional investors accumulated more bitcoin in June
description: There has been a significant increase in bitcoin (BTC) stored on over-the-counter (OTC) trading desks, Ark Invest's Bitcoin Monthly report for June 2023 reveals

title: Trader Issues Warning on Altcoin That’s Up Over 360% Year-to-Date, Updates Outlook on Bitcoin and Pepe
description:
A widely followed crypto analyst is issuing a warning about one altcoin project that more than quadrupled its value this year. Pseudonymous trader Altcoin Sherpa tells his 196,100 Twitter followers that the image-synthesizing ecosystem Render (RNDR) may collapse if Bitcoin (BTC) dips. Altcoin Sherpa also says that if Bitcoin holds the $30,000 level as support, […]

The post Trader Issues Warning on Altcoin That’s Up Over 360% Year-to-Date, Updates Outlook on Bitcoin and Pepe appeared first on The Daily Hodl.
